FAQSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQSection.description: Find answers to common questions about our platform.
FAQSection.faq1_question: How do I get started with the platform?
FAQSection.faq1_answer: Simply submit a request by selecting the service you need. We'll match you with a specialist and draft the contract within one business day. No prepayment is required.
FAQSection.faq2_answer: Yes, if the specialist does not meet your needs, we'll promptly find another professional who fits your requirements at no additional cost.
FAQSection.faq3_question: How many specialists can I hire?
FAQSection.faq3_answer: You can hire as many specialists as you need for your project. We offer both one-time services and long-term collaborations, with no limits.
FAQSection.faq4_question: Are there discounts for small businesses?
FAQSection.faq4_answer: Yes, we offer special terms for small businesses and startups. Contact our team for more details.
FAQSection.faq5_question: How is the quality of services ensured?
FAQSection.faq5_answer: We work only with vetted professionals who have passed our verification process. We also monitor task execution and provide a guarantee on results.
FAQSection.faq6_answer: We offer 24/7 support via email and phone for all clients. We also have a knowledge base and chat for swift assistance at any stage.
